results.notes: Z-machine v4 execution verified. Game runs correctly - displays text, processes commands, handles time progression, Communications Mode works. AMFV is unique: player is a sentient computer (PRISM) with no physical form. Full completion would require simulation mode entry.

observations.game_mechanics: Player is PRISM, a computer AI. Uses Communication codes (PEOF, PPCC, etc.) to interface with world.
observations.simulation_mode: Requires entering simulation after Perelman authorization. May need code wheel for copy protection.
unique_features: No physical player - 'You have no appendages'
NPC events based on time passage
